mapper.insert: insert into t_version ( id, description, versionName, versionNo, downloadUrl, updateUrl, fc, updateTime, `release`, type ) values ( #{id}, #{description}, #{versionName}, #{versionNo}, #{downloadUrl}, #{updateUrl}, #{fc}, #{updateTime}, #{release}, #{type} )
mapper.update:
update t_version
description= #{description},
versionName= #{versionName},
versionNo= #{versionNo},
downloadUrl= #{downloadUrl},
updateUrl= #{updateUrl},
fc = #{fc},
updateTime = #{updateTime},
`release` = #{release},
type=#{type}
where id= #{id}
mapper.select: select * from t_version order by versionNo DESC, updateTime DESC
